Before:
{
  "bounds": [785, 802],
  "children": [
    {
      "bounds": [785, 802],
      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "drawsContent": true,
      "children": [
        {
          "shouldFlattenTransform": false,
          "children": [
            {
              "position": [18, 120],
              "bounds": [100, 100],
              "contentsOpaque": true,
              "drawsContent": true,
              "backgroundColor": "#0000FF",
              "transform": [
                [...],
                [...],
                [...],
                [...]
              ]
            },
            {
              "position": [46, 230],
              "bounds": [146, 452],
              "drawsContent": true
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "shouldFlattenTransform": false,
          "children": [
            {
              "position": [69, 241],
              "bounds": [100, 100],
              "contentsOpaque": true,
              "drawsContent": true,
              "backgroundColor": "#808080",
              "transform": [
                [...],
                [...],
                [...],
                [...]
              ]
            },
            {
              "position": [18, 692],
              "bounds": [100, 100],
              "drawsContent": true
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

After:
{
  "bounds": [785, 802],
  "children": [
    {
      "bounds": [785, 802],
      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "drawsContent": true,
      "children": [
        {
          "shouldFlattenTransform": false,
          "children": [
            {
              "position": [18, 120],
              "bounds": [100, 100],
              "contentsOpaque": true,
              "drawsContent": true,
              "backgroundColor": "#0000FF",
              "transform": [
                [...],
                [...],
                [...],
                [...]
              ]
            },
            {
              "position": [58, 230],
              "bounds": [122, 452],
              "drawsContent": true
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "shouldFlattenTransform": false,
          "children": [
            {
              "position": [69, 241],
              "bounds": [100, 100],
              "contentsOpaque": true,
              "drawsContent": true,
              "backgroundColor": "#808080",
              "transform": [
                [...],
                [...],
                [...],
                [...]
              ]
            },
            {
              "position": [18, 328],
              "bounds": [174, 464],
              "drawsContent": true
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
